constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 110 (Thursday, June 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LOWENTHAL:
H.R. 4147.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Section 8 of Article 1 of the Constitution
[Page H3134]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

policyArea.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

title: To award a Congressional Gold Medal to Billie Jean King, in recognition of her contribution to the Nation and her courageous and groundbreaking leadership advancing equal rights for women and the LGBTQ community in athletics, education, and our society.
